title: На краю села
author: Sokolovsky Oleg
description: Looking at the winter landscapes of the master, you never cease to be wondering how richly someone can imagine the monotonous white color gifted by winter time. 'On the Village Edge' depeens into winter mood. Look the subtle texture of the snow, it is perfectly conveyed. Just amazing how skillfully the color palette is selected. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. The painting is related to realism being a representative of landscapes genre.
